meanings.definition: Any of various plants whose roots are believed to have medicinal properties.
meanings.sent1: The snakeroots were used by the healer to make a special potion.
meanings.sent2: In ancient times, people would gather snakeroots to treat illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The snakeroots whispered to each other about their healing powers.
meanings.sent4: The snakeroots coiled underground, hiding their magical essence.
meanings.sent5: The forest was filled with the vibrant colors of different snakeroots.

meanings.definition: The roots of certain plants used in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent1: Grandma brewed a tea using snakeroots to cure a cold.
meanings.sent2: The wise woman collected snakeroots for her herbal remedies.
meanings.sent3: The snakeroots danced in the pot, creating a healing elixir.
meanings.sent4: The snakeroots held the secrets of nature's medicine within them.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the boiling snakeroots filled the room with comfort.

meanings.definition: Plants with roots that resemble a snake.
meanings.sent1: The garden was full of snakeroots with twisting, serpentine roots.
meanings.sent2: Children loved to play with the snakeroots due to their unique shapes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous snakeroots slithered through the soil like tiny snakes.
meanings.sent4: The snakeroots in the garden seemed to coil and move in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The farmer marveled at the snakeroots' resemblance to real snakes.
